review: I gave the Fire TV Stick 5 stars because it works perfect. I set it up in 5 minutes. It programmed itself. It found my wireless in 10 seconds and prompted me what to do. I have an Amazon account so it arrived programmed in my name. I already have a Smart TV so it duplicates some items such as Netflix etc. but with my Amazon Prime I now get movies and TV series not offered else where. I recommend the Stick to anyone with a HDMI port.
author: Sara "maddog504"

review: If you have cable or satellite service without Fire Stick you're seriously missing the boat.  Start with an Amazon Prime account then DROP any additional services from you cable or satellite provider because you'll get most of that back with your new Fire Stick!
